original_title: Derren Brown: An Evening of Wonders
overview: Brown's third live stage show toured the United Kingdom in 2007 and 2008. "Derren Brown, Mind Reader â€” An Evening of Wonders", began 29 April 2007 in Blackpool, and ended 17 June in Bristol.The show toured again from February until April 2008 throughout the UK, and concluded with a West End run at the Garrick Theatre during May and early June. The West End run was a strictly limited season of 32 performances only. A performance from the last week of the tour at the Garrick Theatre was filmed for Channel 4 and aired on 13 January 2009.
title: Derren Brown: An Evening of Wonders
